sense.gloss: to incline, to lean, to tip, to tilt, to slant, to bend, to list
to devote oneself to, to concentrate on, to pour one's energy into
to ruin, to squander, to empty

sdata.e: I don't think there is any excuse for his behavior. At the same time, we should listen to what he has to say.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑言↑↓い↓うことならなんでも↑耳↑↓みみ↓を↑傾↑↓|かたむ↓ける|だろう。
sdata.e: He listens to whatever you say.

sdata.j: そう↑片意地↑↓かたいじ↓を↑張↑↓は↓らずに、たまには↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑意見↑↓いけん↓に↑耳↑↓みみ↓を↑傾↑↓|かたむ↓ける|ことも↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓だよ。
sdata.e: It is important to sometimes listen to others' points of view instead of being so insistent of your own.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑意見↑↓いけん↓に↑耳↑↓みみ↓を↑傾↑↓|かたむ↓ける|ことも↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓うよ。
sdata.e: I think it's also important to listen to other people's opinions.

sdata.e: Listening carefully to employee suggestions and concerns is helpful in avoiding potential crises.
